::KitKat::

She lifted her head and looked at the spider.  She nodded and said to 
Tarantulus, "Yess,  we will go..." she coughed and dropped her head 
onto her paws.  She lay there, shaking uncontrollably and trying to 
breath.  Her chest hurt and it was getting harder to breath.  She 
closed her eyes and prayed to go into stasis lock.  But it didn't 
happen.  She lay there, shaking and gasping for breath.  She wondered 
if she died now, would the team make it.  She saddly concluded that 
they would survive  very well without her.  She kept her eyes closed 
and waited for stasis lock, or one of them to kill her.
